plot: When Allison's dream seems to foretell Marie's death, she will stop at nothing - including selling the house - to change the future.

Allison dreams that a teenaged Marie is in hospital dying of leukemia. Little Marie is in good health but that doesn't stop Allison from obsessing about the future and Joe has a bit of trouble with her logic. She becomes convinced that environmental factors must be the cause and insists that they sell the house and move. Det. Lee Scanlan investigates the death of a close friend who died from a drug overdose. Although the man was a recovering addict, Scanlan suspects foul play. Allison's dream and the death of Scanlon's friend are connected, however.—garykmcd
